name: Fixed Annuity
description: Pays a guaranteed income for a specified period or for life.

name: Variable Annuity
description: An annuity with investment options, offering potential for higher growth.

name: Registered Index-Linked Annuity (RILA)
description: Offers returns based on a stock market index, with protection against losses.
benefits: Balances growth potential with risk management

name: Term Life Insurance
description: Provides coverage for a specific term (e.g., 10, 20, or 30 years).
benefits: Ideal for covering specific debts like a mortgage

name: Whole Life Insurance
description: Lifelong coverage with a cash value component that grows over time.
benefits: Can be used for estate planning
